original_text: But as it is, Christ has obtained a ministry that is as much more excellent than the old as the covenant he mediates is better, since it is enacted on better promises.
korean_text: 그러나 이제 그는 더 아름다운 직분을 얻으셨으니 그는 더 좋은 약속으로 세우신 더 좋은 언약의 중보자시라

sentences.original_text: But as it is, Christ has obtained a ministry
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 실상은 그리스도께서 한 직분을 얻으셨으니

sentences.original_text: that is much more excellent than the old
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 옛 것보다 훨씬 더 뛰어난 것이라

sentences.original_text: as the covenant he mediates is better
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 중재하는 언약이 더 좋은 것과 같으니

sentences.original_text: since it is enacted on better promises.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 더 좋은 약속 위에 세워졌기 때문이라
